# Input Matrix

```r
library(fastbiom)

counts <- matrix(
  c(185, 0, 206, 1, 0, 900, 0, 100, 1, 1, 25, 556, 2, 288, 270),
  nrow     = 5,
  dimnames = list(
    c('Streptococcus', 'Corynebacterium', 'Haemophilus', 'Propionibacterium', 'Staphylococcus'), 
    c('Saliva', 'Gums', 'Nose') ))

counts
#>                   Saliva Gums Nose
#> Streptococcus        185  900   25
#> Corynebacterium        0    0  556
#> Haemophilus          206  100    2
```
